name: Reset Password Email Template
subject: Reset your password
content:
Hello,

You are receiving this mail because we received a password reset request for your account.

Reset Password 

Or Please paste this link on your browser {{siteUrl}}/reset-password?id={{uuid}}&token={{autorizationToken}}

If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this mail.

Regards,

{{projectName}}

name: Welcome Email Template
subject: Welcome to {{projectName}}
content:
Hi {{userName}},

We're excited to have you get started. First, you need to confirm your account. 

Please verify your email address.

Or Please paste this link on your browser {{accountVerificationLink}}

Thanks and Regards,

{{projectName}}

name: Email Address Verfication Template
subject: Verify Account
content:
Hello,

We're excited to have you get started. First, you need to confirm your account. Just press the button below.

Confirm Account

If that doesn't work, copy and paste the following link in your browser: {{siteUrl}}/verify-email?id={{uuid}}&token={{autorizationToken}}

Thanks!
